hero.title: Making ideas happen
hero.description1: I am a a web developer/fullstacker
hero.description2: I will build your site and make it look awesome

aboutText1: Hello there! My name is José García. I am a fullstack web developer. I enjoy making ideas happen on the web using current development technologies. I build clean, well-designed and user-friendly (with SEO in mind) sites and apps.
aboutText2: I have been working in the field for over 3 years now, helping small businesses grow and thrive by designing custom websites that help them to communicate better with their customers and increase revenue through better visibility on search engines such as Google and Bing/Yahoo!
aboutText3: My clients range from one person micro businesses to large companies like Dt4o . Let's discuss your needs and goals so I can provide you with a plan that will get you the results you want.
fastText: The site's performance is a priority
responsiveText: Web sites that work and look good in different screens
reactiveText: Instant reactions to the user's interactions
formTitle: Have a question or want to work together?

description.queues: This project is about taking tickets to for virtual queues. It aims to eliminate physical queues.
description.johnson-turbine: For over 25 years, Johnson Turbines Support have supported the GG4/FT4 market with an extensive inventory, knowledgeable customer service, and fast and reliable shipping.
description.kanpeki: Santiaguero project that covers Asian and Western pop culture (includes Japanese, Korean, Chinese pop and traditional culture, etc.; in addition to video games, comics, literature in general, cinephilia and world-class music).
description.sanchoRestaurant: Sancho Restaurant, delicious cuisine specialties created with ingenuity and passion, inspired by the fantastic flavors of Spain.
description.zaruArquitectura: Design of different homes and custom exterior and interior decorations.
description.flowers: Sell flowers in their flowerpots so the clients can take care of them. Make the world a beautiful place.

frontendDescription: The visuals the beauty of the project.
backendDescription: Part of the app the user doesn't see. The brains of the project.
languagesDescription: The languages in which you can communicate with me
